value.name: Charges Refiled Against Former Alameda County Deputies in 2015 SF Beating
value.description: Criminal charges have been refiled against two sheriff’s deputies over the 2015 beating of a surrendering suspect. But charges won’t be filed against police who shot a knife-wielding man in a killing that sparked public protests,

value.name: DA files new charges against former Alameda deputies in SF beating
value.description: San Francisco prosecutors have filed new charges against two former Alameda County sheriff’s deputies who beat a man with batons in a case that District Attorney Chesa Boudin calls an “egregious example of police brutality.

value.name: D.A. Chesa Boudin refiles charges against sheriff's deputies in brutal S.F. beating

value.name: Charges refiled against deputies in San Francisco beating | Raleigh News & Observer
value.description: Criminal charges have been refiled against two sheriff’s deputies over the 2015 beating of a surrendering suspect in San Francisco.

value.name: To City College Trustee Tom Temprano and the Board of Trustees
